cashback.title: Cashback
cashback.text: By activating this feature, you agree that you want to claim your bonus

slippage.title: Slippage Tolerance
slippage.text: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.

priceImpact.title: Price impact
priceImpact.text: We will not let you perform a swap if the price impact is more than this percentage.

intermediate.title: Intermediate Tokens
intermediate.text: You can configure the max number of intermediate tokens, thereby controlling the length of the route. The longer it is, the more gas it will consume and the higher the probability of receiving an intermediate token instead of the desired one if swapping through highly volatile pools or with low slippage.

volatility.title: Pools Volatility
volatility.text: You can exclude routes that use highly volatile (and therefore high-risk) pools. Volatility is considered the ratio of the max and min price rates in the pool over the last 15 minutes.

parallel.title: Parallel transactions
parallel.text: You can set the maximum number of parallel transactions, which allows for build more profitable routes.
parallel.textW5: Get the option to choose up to 20 routes with
parallel.tooltip: However, this also increases the amount of gas that will be consumed and the probability of receiving an intermediate token instead of the desired one when swapping.

referralInfo.heading: Referral program
referralInfo.description: Invite friends and earn a percentage of the commission from their transactions! When your friend uses your link, they automatically become your referral.
empty: The referral list is currently empty.
Share your referral link with other users

referralLink.caption: Your referral link
referralLink.description: This is your referral link, as soon as your friend clicks on the link, he will automatically become your referral

questions: How is the reward percentage calculated?
What is the referral system level?
How to increase the reward percentage?
answers:
The reward percentage is based on your level.
swap.coffee does not charge users any additional fees. We share a portion of our commission profits with the user, ensuring there are no extra costs.
The level of the referral system indicates your percentage of income from referrals. The higher the level, the higher the reward percentage.
Only new users can be invited as referrals. Users who have previously used swap.coffee cannot be invited as referrals.
Tools for level upgrades will be added later. Special conditions apply for influencers. For details, please contact our Telegram.

On the referral program page, you can see the total amount of your earnings. This includes all your referrals from all DEX.
In the claim center, you can request the amount earned from StonFi. Rewards from DeDust will be available for claiming later, after their distribution.
referralFaq.levels:
We have three commission levels:
Bronze - For all users
Silver - For CES stakers (Coming soon)
Gold - For influencers

terms: The promotion is valid only for new customers of the partner.

The discount is applied to the current price and cannot be combined with other promotions. It does not apply to other partner offers. The promo code is not valid for payment on the following brands, products, and services: Apple, Beats, Prada, Miu Miu.
The number of promo codes is limited. Conditions may be changed by the partner, and the promotion may be prematurely terminated if all promo codes are used up.
